THE LOUDEST. THE CHEAPEST.
THE Careful comparison has proved to Record Buyers that TWINS" are ahead of all competitors, not only from a recording point of view, but also for the great variety of titles which have been produced. The Artistes who have contributed their quota to the Twin" Catalogue are among the very best of their particular class on Concert or Music Hall platforms, with the result that superfine Records of their latest bits have been made. ] Por tone and artigtistic merit TWIN" Band Records are superior to all ethers, and have been universall y acclaimed for their musical excellence. In addition to being the loudest on earth, they are the most perfect from a musician's standpoint. In spite of their marvellous value, and the enormous cost of pro
duction, the price of TWIN" DOIIBLE-SIDED DISC RECORDS has been fixed to suit all pockets, viz: f 1»8O. .On sale at the duly coostituted agents of the GRAMOPHONE COMPANY LIMITED: THE GRAMOPHONE COMPANY LTD. maakt wo'den en met het Gillette-apparaat kan men zich zonder gevaar of bezeeren vlug en glad cchtreo. Men wordt vooral verzocht, er op te letten, dat het apparaat evenals de mesjes werkelijk bësTGillette. echt Gillette zijn. Men verlange 9rhoOP700n Na jarenlang probeeren is het ons gelukt, -OtlltiOl £t/C|J. njt dealleibpgte bestanddeelen een scheer zeep te maken, die als de ideale genoemd kan worden. De resultaten zjjn schitterend, want de huid blijft bij het scheren goed en de baard gaat verrassend goed ermede af.
